column4: how can I setup two monitors for my Ubuntu, one is laptop the other is LCD
I am using 8.04, dont see monitors there
upgrade to 10.04 OR write your own xorg.conf
10.04 ate all my stuffs, first mouse, then wifi then nvidia
writing your own xorg.conf is complicated, but there are pleny of resources on google and you can also view the manual by typing 'man xorg.conf' into a terminal
